articles.author: Ed Cara
articles.title: Leprosy’s Origins Are Even Weirder Than We Thought - Gizmodo
articles.description: New research complicates the narrative of how leprosy reached the Americas.
articles.content: One of the world’s oldest diseases has an even more complex history than expected. Research out today reveals that a form of leprosy was stalking people in the Americas long before Europeans arrived.… [+4553 chars]
